New Records: LeBron James passed John Stockton for fifth on the all-time games played list
Key Match Events: The Lakers won the game against the New Orleans Pelicans with a score of 104-99
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James is in his 22nd season, and he came into the game with averages of 23.5 points, 8.8 rebounds and 9.6 assists per contest
Post-Match Reflections: The Lakers are in the middle of a four-game winning streak and currently the fifth seed in the Western Conference
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James is in his seventh season playing for the Lakers
Others: The Lakers will play their next game on Tuesday evening when they host Jordan Clarkson and the Utah Jazz in California
